name: GameStar Plus
highlight: Gamestar+ redefines social gaming by bringing game night onto the blockchain. As the first blockchain-enabled streaming gaming on demand (SGoD) platform, Gamestar+ offers play-to-earn features, NFT trading, and world-famous brands and games streamed into your living room.
summary: Gamestar+ brings your game night into the future with the worldâ€™s first streaming gaming platform for interactive social gaming experiences and TV board games. Play games that include Jeopardy, Movie Scene It?, and Family Feud, updated with immersive on-demand streaming features that connect your game night to the metaverse. The Gamestar+ platform leverages Avalanche technology to facilitate play-to-earn features. Gamestar+ users play their favorite family game night games to earn blockchain tokens, NFTs, and other tokenized assets that can be traded within the Gamestar+ marketplace or for other cryptocurrencies.Gamestar+ is designed to revolutionize game night by bringing some of the most well-known brands and IPs onto the blockchain and into the metaverse. True online play reconnects friends and families through interactive gaming experiences with competitive play-to-earn elements.
